author: Brian Koerber
title: Trying to get celebrities to join a Zoom call is actually a hilarious game
description: When the novelty of socializing via Zoom calls wears off, it's time to get a little creative. Thanks to various stay at home orders, shows like ESPN's Always Late with Katie Nolan are trying new and interesting ways to keep their viewers engaged under less th…
content:
